name: Space Defence (itch) (shadow427)
description:
A space based strategy game, where you must survive waves of enemies (0 to 100), by using towers and a spaceship.

this is a two player game, one player will control the mech and the other can control the spaceship but it can also be played by just one player. (I'll probably change it to a one player game)

THE MECH : can take control of towers so you can shoot them more accurately and it can also heal all objects within its radius

THE SPACESHIP: this has two abilities, a shield and a ram attack and can level up  to unlock a 3rd one- spawning small ships that explodes enemies on impact. 

All towers and the spaceship can level up after landing enough attacks.

use the '1,2,3,4' keys to select ad object to place, the 'w,a,s,d' keys to move it around and shift to place it, all other controls should be shown in the options page.  you cam also change them.

game is still in development so please do give feedback on anything I should improve as well as any bugs you come across.
